messages.subject: Re: Crass Commercial message
messages.msgSnippet: John - Just noticed that you live in the Channel Islands.  Must be a neat place.  I am a sometime collector of sterling and coin silver, mainly flatware, with
messages.messageBody:
John -

Just noticed that you live in the Channel Islands. Must be a neat
place. I am a sometime collector of sterling and coin silver, mainly
flatware, with emphasis on the early Georgian and American Colonial
and Empire periods. One of my interests is the provincial Brit
silver, of which the Channel Islands are one of the more obscure and
collectible. Sooooo, my off-the-wall question is, does old Channel
Island silver show up more often for sale in the Channel Islands, or
has the majority of it been dispersed to the four winds? TIA for any
info!

NC

messages.subject: Crass Commercial message

messages.messageBody:
All, I have listed a Bizen Sukesada wakizashi for sale by consignment,
take a look

http://www.whiz.com.au/richard/Sukesada/Sukesada.htm

Also, the price on the Sukekuni Nginata has been reduced.

http://www.whiz.com.au/richard/Sukekuni/sukekuni.htm

Cheers

Rich T
